title: Pet friendly! (breed restrictions apply)
posting_body: Cast a spotlight on your new home at Venue and be the star of your own show at Venue Apartments in San Jose, CA.
Here at Venue, you can stand out from the crowd - or just mingle and blend in at one our many social and media spaces.
Network with friends at our state-of-the-art outdoor media hub or conference rooms and entertain at the beautiful pool, outdoor fireplace lounge or chic resident lounge with WiFi.
For some me time, take advantage of our 24 hour athletic center with yoga studio.
Venue in San Jose, CA offers modern living in the perfect location.
Located in the heart of North San Jose, Venue is only a short walk away from Baypointe Light Rail Station and merely blocks from Cisco and a short commute to other Silicon Valley employers.
Let life take center stage at Venue Apartments in San Jose, CA.
- French door to patio or balcony with storage
- Wide oval tubs with ceramic tile surrounds
- Baths with polished quartz vanities, framed mirrors
- High nine-foot ceilings with lighted ceiling fans and track lighting
- Choice of medium or dark wood-tone cabinets
- Multiple outlets for Internet, cable TV, phones throughout
- Quartz countertops in two color choices
- Clean steel appliances: gas range, microwave and Energy Star® refrigerator & dishwasher
- Resident clubhouse TV lounge, game area
- Shimmering lap pool with cabana and fountain
- 24-hour fitness center with separate yoga room
- Card access garage and pedestrian entries
- Private dining room and adjoining kitchen
- Resident business center and WiFi cafe
Please visit our website for additional details.
3737 Casa Verde Street, San Jose, CA, 95134
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
